item.title: UNIVERSAL SECURITY INSTRUMENTS INC 10-K
item.description: UNIVERSAL SECURITY INSTRUMENTS INC, which is in the Wholesale-Electronic Parts & Equipment, Nec [5065] industry, SEC 10-K filing on July 08, 2021 had 11186 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: company - 268 instances 31 - 169 instances march - 159 instances 2020 - 147 instances 2021 - 131 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
